sentences.sContent: The cape extends far into the ocean.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cape extends far into the ocean.

sentences.sContent: The mountains trap rains and fogs generated over the ocean.
sentences.sContent_eng: The mountains trap rains and fogs generated over the ocean.
sentences.sCn: 这些山脉隔开了海洋上生成的雨和雾。

sentences.sContent: They are found in every ocean, from the surface to the deep sea.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are found in every ocean, from the surface to the deep sea.
sentences.sCn: 你可以在每一个海洋找到它们，从海平面到深海区。

sentences.sContent: ...The high cost of steam and the lesser need for speed kept the majority of the world's ocean freight moving by sail until the early years of the 20th century...
...as a Yemeni airliner did on its way to Comoros Islands in the India ocean June 30...
...Space probes have provided evidence that Europa has a large ocean under its surface...
...So the lack of light in Europa’s sub-surface ocean doesn’t automatically rule out life forming...
